trans-unit.source: Displays byte arrays in hexadecimal, ANSI, and Unicode formats.
trans-unit.target: Viser byte matriser i heksadesimal ANSI og Unicode-formater.

trans-unit.source: ByteViewer provides an interface for viewing hexadecimal, ANSI, and Unicode formatted data.
trans-unit.target: ByteViewer gir et grensesnitt for visning heksadesimale, ANSI, og Unicode formaterte data.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode> enumeration specifies the identifiers that are used to indicate the display mode to use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>opplisting angir identifikatorer som brukes til å angi visningsmodus skal brukes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode> display mode selects a default display mode based on the contents of the byte array.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>visningsmodus velger en standard visningsmodus basert på innholdet i Bytematrisen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: ByteViewer uses a simple algorithm to determine what kind of data is stored in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: ByteViewer bruker en algoritme som enkelt å finne ut hvilken type data lagres i bufferen.

trans-unit.source: The hexadecimal <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode> view displays the hexadecimal values and corresponding byte representations (chars) in a read-only edit box.
trans-unit.target: Heksadesimalt <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>visningen viser heksadesimale verdiene og tilhørende byte representasjoner (tegn) i en skrivebeskyttet redigeringsboksen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The default number of columns is 16.
trans-unit.target: Standardantall kolonner er 16.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode> views show the byte array in a read-only edit box.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>visninger vises i bytematrise i en skrivebeskyttet redigeringsboks.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: In these views, `NUL` characters are replaced with Unicode block characters.
trans-unit.target: I disse visningene `NUL` tegn erstattes med Unicode block-tegn.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ByteViewer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ByteViewer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bytes in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Henter byte i bufferen.

trans-unit.source: The unsigned byte array reference.
trans-unit.target: Usignert byte matrisereferanse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the display mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter visningsmodusen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The display mode that this control uses.
trans-unit.target: Visningsmodus som bruker denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The returned value is defined in <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte verdien er definert i <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Writes the raw data from the data buffer to a file.
trans-unit.target: Skriver Rå data fra databufferen til en fil.

trans-unit.source: The file path to save to.
trans-unit.target: Banen til å lagre.

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: path is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: pathen tom streng (""), inneholder bare mellomrom eller inneholder én eller flere ugyldige tegn.

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte banen er ugyldig, for eksempel er på en lokal stasjon.

trans-unit.source: The file write failed.
trans-unit.target: Skrivingen mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte banen, filnavnet eller begge være lengre enn den systemdefinerte maksimumslengden.

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel på Windows-baserte plattformer baner må være mindre enn 248 tegn, og filnavn må være mindre enn 260 tegn.

trans-unit.source: The access requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified path, such as when access is or and the file or directory is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang forespurt tillates ikke av operativsystemet for den angitte path , for eksempel når tilgang er eller og filen eller mappen er angitt for skrivebeskyttet tilgang.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged"></xref> event on the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ByteViewer"></xref> control's <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Behandler den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.ValueChanged"> </xref> hendelse på den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ByteViewer"> </xref> kontrollens <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Sets the byte array to display in the viewer.
trans-unit.target: Angir bytematrise skal vises i hendelseslisten.

trans-unit.source: The byte array to display.
trans-unit.target: Bytematrise skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The specified byte array is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte Bytematrisen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the current display mode.
trans-unit.target: Angir gjeldende visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The display mode to set.
trans-unit.target: Visningsmodus angi.

trans-unit.source: The specified display mode is not from the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte visningsmodusen er ikke fra den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Sets the file to display in the viewer.
trans-unit.target: Angir filen som skal vises i hendelseslisten.

trans-unit.source: The viewer loads the data to view from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Visningsprogrammet laster inn dataene for å vise fra den angitte filen.

trans-unit.source: This method throws an exception if the file load fails.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppstår det et unntak hvis filen belastningen mislykkes.

trans-unit.source: The file path to load from.
trans-unit.target: Banen til å laste inn fra.

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: path is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: pathen tom streng (""), inneholder bare mellomrom eller inneholder én eller flere ugyldige tegn.

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte banen er ugyldig, for eksempel er på en lokal stasjon.

trans-unit.source: The file load failed.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke laste inn filen.

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte banen, filnavnet eller begge være lengre enn den systemdefinerte maksimumslengden.

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel på Windows-baserte plattformer baner må være mindre enn 248 tegn, og filnavn må være mindre enn 260 tegn.

trans-unit.source: The access requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified path, such as when access is or and the file or directory is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang forespurt tillates ikke av operativsystemet for den angitte path , for eksempel når tilgang er eller og filen eller mappen er angitt for skrivebeskyttet tilgang.

trans-unit.source: Sets the current line for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode"></xref> view.
trans-unit.target: Angir gjeldende linje for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode"> </xref> visningen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode> display mode displays the buffer starting at the specified line.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>visningsmodus viser bufferen med Start fra den angitte linjen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: If the specified line is out of range, the start line is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det angitte er utenfor området, er start linjen satt til null.

trans-unit.source: The current line to display from.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende linje skal vises fra.
